mapper.select: SELECT C.CLASS_ID, C.CLASS_NAME, C.PRICE, C.CLASS_TIME, C.EXPLANATION, C.CLASS_GROUP, C.DIFFICULTY, NVL(TRUNC(AVG(R.REVIEW_STAR),1),0) AS STAR, COUNT(R.REVIEW_ID) AS REVIEW_COUNT FROM CLASS_INFO C, REVIEWS R WHERE C.CLASS_ID = R.GROUP_ID(+) AND C.CLASS_ID = #{classId} GROUP BY C.CLASS_ID, C.CLASS_NAME, C.PRICE, C.CLASS_TIME, C.EXPLANATION, C.CLASS_GROUP, C.DIFFICULTY
SELECT * from MEDIA where GROUP_ID = #{classId} ORDER BY SUB_GROUP
SELECT COUNT(C.CLASS_ID) AS TOTAL_RECORD FROM CLASS_INFO C, CLASSES L WHERE C.CLASS_ID = L.CLASS_ID(+)
SELECT MAX(C.PRICE) FROM CLASS_INFO C, CLASSES L WHERE C.CLASS_ID = L.CLASS_ID(+)
SELECT MIN(C.PRICE) FROM CLASS_INFO C, CLASSES L WHERE C.CLASS_ID = L.CLASS_ID(+)
